social media users have a responsibility to protect their personal information regarding data privacy. it is important to be cautious about sharing sensitive details online, as they can be easily accessed by hackers and scammers. users should also ensure that their passwords are strong and unique, and avoid using the same password across different accounts. additionally, social media platforms like twitter allow users to control their privacy settings, such as who can see their tweets or profile information.
